description: This women's bangle is a stylish and practical accessory that is inspired by the arrangement of scales. It is made of durable acrylic material and features a unique design that combines two different textures of acrylic that are cut into half-circular shapes, heated, and bent, then stacked in a layered arrangement. The scale-like design not only adds style to the bangle, but it also hides the elastic cord inside, giving it a more polished look.This bangle is a versatile accessory that can be worn with any outfit and for any occasion, making it a perfect addition to any woman's jewelry collection.
